name: The Soul Harvester
description:
"walking alone at the park in midnight after the party was over, you try to get back home but then you discover something is not right. instead of the that place you remembered became something else."

a short walking simulator about a Soul Harvester that consumes souls from humans.this game was made just for fun. it's a very short game that take around 4-5  minutes I think. have fun :)
